title: Suki da!! Oka-kun!!
sinopse:
Satsuki Oka's classmate Hajime Tsunefusa asks to meet on the roof, and then asks Satsuki out. Although he has no problem with two guys dating, Satsuki's not interested in guys himself. He rejects Hajime straight away, but then Hajime starts following him around...

(source: Renta!)
